This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us. But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt wrote. The change over indicates there's been a clear decision to put a technologist back in charge and to return some of the founding drive to strategic and day-to-day decisions, given Larry Page 's role
